attributes.action: The addition of a McDonalds in Hornchurch, London to raise spirits in the area.
attributes.background: Hornchurch Town Centre was deprived of a McDonalds three years ago and ever since then pupils from Havering Sixth Form College and Campion School have needed to travel to Romford to get a McDonalds. The addition of a McDonalds in Hornchurch will reduce emissions as its more accessible by walking.
